text: [Music]
amazon personalize is an aws service
which enables developers to build a
real-time machine learning based
personalization system quickly
eliminating undifferentiated heavy
lifting and improving time to value if
you've never used amazon personalized
before that's okay
we've made it super simple to get up and
running so you can start delivering
personalized experiences to your
customers as quickly as possible first
you'll discover the power of amazon
personalized through the magic movie
machine
using amazon personalize the magic movie
machine recommends movies based on your
input other people's interests and the
characteristics of a large data set of
movies
in this interactive demonstration you
will begin to see how you can leverage
the recommendations generated by amazon
personalized to present new and
interesting product choices to your
customers
next you can follow our guided notebook
to get hands-on with amazon personalize
and implement a personalization system
in your own aws environment
using the notebook you'll build a
working demo which you can adapt to your
own use case
finally you can take a self-paced
tutorial for technical builders to start
using the features of amazon personalize
it is designed to be completed in an
hour or less the tutorial covers the
core concepts workflows and cost for
builders to apply amazon personalized to
their use case
with the help of these resources you can
start delivering personalized
recommendations to your users in no time
[Music]
